name: Goodbye Limbs
description:
Created in under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 44
Theme: Your life is currency

You are really drunk in the megacity and must get back to your hole. Along the way you encounter shady people with tempting offers. What uses do these mysterious items have, if any?

Controls:
A & D / Gamepad Triggers: Step feet / Use leg item
Left & Right Mouse Buttons / Gamepad Shoulders: Raise hands / Use arm item
Escape / Start: Pause
